data.title: Sorting
data.statement: You must sort all characters by ASCII value in each word in [[message]]

testCases.title: 10 words
testCases.testIn: if i told you the solution what would you do?
testCases.testOut: fi i dlot ouy eht ilnoostu ahtw dlouw ouy ?do

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: if i told you the solution what would you do
testCases.testOut: fi i dlot ouy eht ilnoostu ahtw dlouw ouy do

testCases.title: 15 words
testCases.testIn: top 10 in global: dbdr, eulerscheZahl, _royale, trictrac, wala, neumann, jolindien, marchete, antisquid, magus

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: top 10 in global: dbdr, eulerscheZahl, _royale, trictrac, wala, neumann, jolindien, marchete, antisquid, maus

testCases.title: 100 words
testCases.testIn: In the years from 1810, increasingly less socially involved, Beethoven composed many of his most admired works including his later symphonies and his mature chamber music and piano sonatas. His only opera, Fidelio, which had been first performed in 1805, was revised to its final version in 1814. He composed his Missa Solemnis in the years 1819-1823, and his final, Ninth, Symphony, one of the first examples of a choral symphony, from 1822-1824. Written in his last years, his late string quartets of 1825-1826 are amongst his final achievements. After some months of bedridden illness, he died in 1827. Beethoven's

data.constraints:
1 < [[Length of message by words]] < 250
5 < [[Length of message]] < 700
data.stubGenerator:
read message:string(700)
write sorted message

INPUT
message: Only ASCII Characters, 0 < [[Length of message]] < 700

OUTPUT
Only ASCII Characters, 0 < [[Length of message]] < 700

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must sort all characters by ASCII value in each word in message
Input
message
Output
sorted_message
Constraints
1 < Length of message by words < 250
5 < Length of message < 700
Example
Input
hello world
Output
ehllo dlorw
